name: The Sheeper
description:
You are a shepard, if you feed and give water to your sheep they will reproduce at the end of a night!

When its night you become a ware wolf nad you need to kill sheep to gain food (one sheep = one bar)

Every morning there is a chance that a random sheep will get infected with a sickness, if it gets close to other sheep it might infect them, sheeps die after being infected for some time!

Days you surviver = your score!

Art by IAmHappy mostly and some by ne_mene

Music by Markositta

SFX by ne_mene

Programming by ne_mene
